biocontainers.name: cameo
biocontainers.summary: Cameo - computer aided metabolic engineering & optimization

biotools.summary: Continuously evaluates the accuracy and reliability of protein structure prediction methods in a fully automated manner. CAMEO currently assesses predictions in two categories (3D protein structure modeling and protein structure model quality predictions). The project is open to everyone and has been used by several method developer groups to benchmark and monitor their servers and new developments.
